sameAnalysis.part_name: 这4个名词都含有"商店"之意。
means: department ： 作商店解时，是美国英语，通常写为department store。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这5个名词都含有"商店"之意。
means: store ： 在美国指出售同一类商品的小型商店。在英国用复数形式表示百货商店。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这6个名词都含有"商店"之意。
means: shop ： 指规模较小，出售同一类商品的店铺。

sentence.Network_en: The victim was outside a shop when he was attacked.

sentence.Network_en: The shop assistant received me indifferently while leaning on a counter.

sentence.Network_en: It's a new shop selling discounted lines and seconds.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是家新开的商店，出售打折商品和等外品。

jx.jx_en_mean: To go from store to store in search of merchandise or bargains.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 逐店选购：从一家商店到另一家商店，寻找商品或便宜货

jx.jx_en_mean: To look for something, such as a better job.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 寻找想要的东西：寻找某物，如一个更好的工作

jx.jx_en_mean: To offer (a large block of common stock, for example) for sale to various parties
jx.jx_cn_mean: 出售股票：把（比如大量普通股票）卖给各方

lj.lj_ly: “&I{[The company]}  is now actively being shopped around, with a prospectus in circulation” (&b{Marianne Yen})
lj.lj_ls: “&I{[公司]} 现在积极地出售股票，企业介绍书也在发行中” (&b{玛丽安娜·叶恩})

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: shortening of Old French eschoppe 'lean-to booth', of West Germanic origin; related to German Schopf 'porch' and English dialect shippon 'cattle shed'. The verb is first recorded (mid 16th cent.) in the sense 'imprison' (from an obsolete slang use of the noun for 'prison'), hence sense 2

entry.def: A shop is a building or part of a building where things are sold.
When you shop, you go to shops and buy things.

example.ex: He always shopped at the Co-op.
example.tran: 他一直在合作社买东西。

example.ex: ...some advice that's worth bearing in mind when shopping for a new carpet.
example.tran: 买新地毯时值得参考的一些建议

entry.def: You can refer to a place where a particular service is offered as a particular type of shop .

example.ex: ...the barber shop where Rodney sometimes had his hair cut.
example.tran: 罗德尼有时去理发的那家理发店

entry.def: You can refer to a place where things are made or done as a particular kind of shop .
If you shop someone, you report them to the police for doing something illegal.

example.ex: His father was so disgusted to discover his son was dealing drugs he shopped him to police...
example.tran: 他父亲发现儿子在贩毒时深感憎恶，就向警察告发了他。

example.ex: Fraudsters are often shopped by honest friends and neighbours.
example.tran: 诈骗犯经常会被正直守法的朋友和邻居告发。

entry.def: If something is happening all over the shop, it is happening in many different places or throughout a wide area.

example.ex: This gave them the freedom to make trouble all over the shop without fear of retribution.
example.tran: 这使他们可以肆意到处惹是生非，而不用担心受到惩罚。

entry.def: If you set up shop, you start a business.

example.ex: He set up shop as an independent PR consultant...
example.tran: 他自己开公司，做起了独立公共关系顾问。

example.ex: He has just set up shop in Cherbourg.
example.tran: 他刚刚在瑟堡开业不久。

entry.tran: (商店、办事处、公司)休息，下班，打烊，停业，歇业
entry.def: When a shop, office, or firm shuts up shop, it stops doing business and closes, either at the end of the day or permanently.

example.ex: If they had been faced with the bill they'd have shut up shop and fled the country.
example.tran: 他们要是看到这账单，早就关门歇业逃到国外去了。

entry.tran: 谈论本行工作;三句话不离本行
entry.def: If you say that people are talking shop, you mean that they are talking about their work, and this is boring for other people who do not do the same work.

example.ex: If you hang around with colleagues all the time you just end up talking shop.
example.tran: 如果整天和同事泡在一起的话，你最终就会变得开口闭口都是工作。

means.word_mean: 1. a mercantile establishment for the retail sale of goods or services;

sentences.sentence: "he bought it at a shop on Cape Cod"

means.word_mean: 2. small workplace where handcrafts or manufacturing are done
3. a course of instruction in a trade (as carpentry or electricity);
2. do one's shopping at; do business with; be a customer or client of

sentences.sentence: "I don't need help, I'm just browsing"
"He told on his classmate who had cheated on the exam"

auth_sentence.res_content: They also consider what makes a good shop assistant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also consider what makes a good shop assistant.

auth_sentence.res_content: The shop needs to be part of the scheme.

auth_sentence.content: She applied at a machine shop in central Pennsylvania.
auth_sentence.res_content: She applied at a machine shop in central Pennsylvania.

Sentence.sentence: She always argued about prices in shops.
The project is a growing one and is spread from the park to the school and the shopping center.
Trees and flowers have all been planted in the shopping center, making the atmosphere pleasant
The shopping center is flooded with people.
Most of them are specially made for his shop.
The kitchenware in his shop is of unique design

sentences.en: That shop deals in men's clothing.
sentences.cn: 那家商店经营男式服装。

sentences.en: He worked in a carpenter's shop.
She has gone out to shop.
We shopped all the main shops.
sentences.cn: 我们把主要的商店都逛遍了。

jushi.english: He found he could make no money as a writer so he decided to open a shop.
jushi.chinese: 他发现当作家挣不到钱,所以他决定开商店。

jushi.english: I want this shop to run as smoothly as possible.
jushi.chinese: 我想让这个机构办得尽可能顺利。

jushi.english: She often browses in dress shops during her lunch hour.
jushi.chinese: 她经常利用午餐休息时间逛逛服装店。
